title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 1, 2018
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with President Emmanuel Macron of France.  Both leaders discussed the migration problem in Libya, and timelines to solve it.  President Trump underscored the need to rebalance trade with Europe.
